title: Top Cordless Vacuum 2026 - Best 5 For Less Dusty Home!
relevance: Our exact target format: fully faceless B-roll compilation, Top 5 product ranking with affiliate links. No presenter, no avatar. 87K views and 9.5% like ratio prove this format delivers strong engagement. Closest reference to what Rayviews will produce.
summary: Top 5 cordless vacuums for 2026 using entirely faceless B-roll editing. Manufacturer promotional videos and original close-up demo footage with clean white sans-serif text overlays for feature callouts. Products: Levoit LVAC-200, Bissell Cleanview XR Pet 300W, Dyson V8 Plus, Shark Detect Pro, Dyson V11. Description uses amzn.to short links per product.

key_insights.insight: Faceless B-roll compilation with 3-5 second clips delivers 87K views and 9.5% like ratio — outperforms talking-head format for product rankings
Text overlays are feature-focused ('tangle-resistant roller') not product-focused — clean white sans-serif at bottom of screen, 2-3 second hold
Hard cuts only, no transitions. Continuous visual flow maintained by matching action between cuts. ~1.5 min per product for 5 products
Manufacturer B-roll is primary content source — brand YouTube channels, press kits, promo videos. Dzine AI must generate equivalent quality in realistic home environments
All footage in real-world environments (kitchen, living room, hardwood floors) — no studio white-background shots. Critical for 40+/50+ target audience trust
Description uses fire emoji + general link, numbered list with checkmark emojis + individual amzn.to links, 'What You'll Learn' section, hashtags — proven template
Higher production quality (sharper footage, better text overlays) correlates with higher engagement vs similar faceless channels
Short duration (8 min for 5 products) keeps segments tight and information-dense. Validates our 1300-1800 word script target

editing_style.text_overlays: feature-callout text in clean white sans-serif at bottom of screen, 2-3s hold — plus manufacturer brand text visible in some promo footage
editing_style.graphics: minimal — no animated graphics, no comparison tables, no spec cards
editing_style.pacing: fast — 3-5 second clips, ~1.5 min per product, continuous flow with no pauses
editing_style.camera_work: no camera — all B-roll footage. Mix of hero shots, close-ups, lifestyle usage, and brand promo clips
editing_style.product_presentation: manufacturer B-roll and original demo footage in real-world environments (kitchen, living room, hardwood floors). Close-ups of roller heads, dustbins, features in action
editing_style.structure: hook (B-roll montage + title) → [product hero → close-up features → lifestyle usage → text overlays] x5 → closing

production_budget_estimate.note: Faceless format — no lip sync needed. 5 products x 5 images x 40 credits (4K) = 1000 image credits; 5 products x 2 video clips x ~77 credits (Hailuo 2.3) = 770 video credits

action_items.action: Create DaVinci Resolve text overlay template: white sans-serif, bottom-positioned, feature-callout style matching this video
Update Dzine prompts to prioritize realistic home environments (kitchen, living room, hardwood) over white studio backgrounds
Build faceless B-roll timeline template in DaVinci Resolve: [hook] [product segments x5] [closing] with 3-5s clip pacing
Add product name + rank number overlays at each segment start as competitive advantage
Adopt description template: general affiliate link, numbered product list with amzn.to links, What You'll Learn section, hashtags
Generate Minimax Hailuo 2.3 demo clips per product (usage in real environment, feature close-up) to match manufacturer B-roll quality

analysis_meta.transcript_note: Analysis based on sampled frames, no transcript extracted
